short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accelerate the establishment of relationships on social media. Use AI to create engaging responses to posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey there! Ready to up your game on X (you know, the place Twitter evolved into)? We've got something cool for you. This Google Chrome plugin is like sliding into DMs, but way cooler. It uses AI to help you whip up awesome comments on X posts in no time. 

Think less typing, more vibing. Whether you're looking to make new friends, get more followers, or just be the life of the online party, this plugin's got your back. Get ready to transform your X profile and have some fun along the way!
